subtitle: CANVAS PAINTING GAME
welcome: Welcome to REBASED PIXELS! Here you can create digital pixel art - either alone or together with other artists on the IOTA Blockchain.
dragToResize: Drag with your mouse to adjust the canvas size.

multiplayer.title: Multiplayer Blockchain
multiplayer.description: Draw together with others on a canvas. Each pixel is confirmed by a blockchain transaction. Your pixel remains stored on the blockchain forever.

singleplayer.title: Singleplayer
singleplayer.description: Draw freely without blockchain transactions. You can adjust the canvas size and place pixels without connecting a wallet.

battle.title: Battle Mode
battle.description: Pixel battle against other players. Overpaint others' pixels and defend your territory. Coming soon!
